name: Are Control-likes and Japanese RPGs so different?
name_original: Are Control-likes and Japanese RPGs so different?
description:
Survive the onslaught of bullets as lasers while completing objectives for points!

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Space - dash

The Objectives

  • Enter blue circles
  • Press "F" to charge pink circles
  • Stand in green circles to activate safe zone. Player is protected from bullets while inside.

Web Version:

http://kirbycofino.com/games/gmtkj2020/index.html

Window version in downloads

Created By

Monish Gupta, Harrison Gottlieb, Kirby Cofino and Patrick Lange
